title: Full Stack Developer
summary-1: I am a Graduate FullStack developer with 3 years of passionate coding experience.
summary-2: Focused on creating modern, responsive, highly interactive web applications. My favorite ingredients are Java, Angular, MySQL with Spring, Hibernate, Apache Tomcat and Maven.
summary-3: I like to get busy with coding. However, I manage to make some time for Painting, Playing the Guitar, Traveling, Baking cakes, Reading some nice books.
